meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>leader</radical> is also a <radical>director</radical> so you need to <kanji>pay respects</kanji> to him before you can start filming. He’s a huge big-shot and you don’t want to offend him by not paying the proper respects, so you make sure to bow every time you go on stage.
readingMnemonic: It turns out you're filming Iron Chef, and the leader and director is Chairman Kaga. You <kanji>pay respects</kanji> to him by saying <reading>Ooh! Kaga</reading> (うかが).
